meanings.def: at any time that; on any occasion that
examples: You can ask for help whenever you need it.
Whenever she comes, she brings a friend.
The roof leaks whenever it rains.
We try to help whenever possible.

meanings.def: used when the time when something happens is not important
examples: ‘When do you need it by?’ ‘Saturday or Sunday. Whenever.’
It's not urgent—we can do it next week or whenever.

related: as/whenever, etc. the fancy takes you

meanings.def: used in questions to mean ‘when’, expressing surprise
examples: Whenever did you find time to do all that cooking?
